attestations.issuerDescription: Connect your Twitter & claim your social attestations on the Linea Network. Your attestations will be directly embedded in Linea's Reputation Layer. They allow the ecosystem & partnered protocols alike to better identify, target & reward their users based on their social presence.
A Decentralized authentication protocol that provides proofs for user's Web2 accounts.

By collecting “stamps” of validation for your identity and online reputation, you can gain access to the most trustworthy web3 experiences and maximize your ability to benefit from platforms like Gitcoin Grants. The more you verify your identity, the more opportunities you will have to vote and participate across the web3.
Designed for users to access and take advantage of their wallet history. Utilized by BUIDLers to grow faster by engaging and incentivizing genuine contributors and early adopters.
Orange is a reputation minting protocol that aggregates data and models to generate comprehensive trust proofs in the form of VCs and NFTs.

By leveraging PADO's cryptographic infrastructure, users can securely and confidently attest to their off-chain data, create their own attestations, while ensuring authenticity and preserving privacy.
Privado id powers verifiable claims for humanity, uniqueness and much more. It enable users to share zk proof of such a reusable claim ensuring privacy of user identity.
Privado id powers verifiable claims for humanity, uniqueness and much more. It enable users to share zk proof of such a reusable claim ensuring privacy of user identity.
RubyScore portal for Linea level certificates.
Trusta collaborates with Linea for both on-chain reputation and proof of humanity attestations. Trusta attestations will showcase Linea-Verax's potential as a public good.

Connect wallet to LINEA to generate your Trusta MEDIA reputation attestation. It is evaluated based only on your onchain behavior (Monetary/Engagement/Diversity/Identity/Age), without any request for your personal info.
Hexes that received one among Alpha/Beta/Gamma/Delta NFTs by participating to the Linea Testnet Voyage are eligible for Group A POH without the need of additional attestation.
Generating a zero-knowledge proof based on an HTTPS Web Session that represents your IRL assets and identity, right in the browser locally, and no API authorization is required.
Generating a zero-knowledge proof based on an HTTPS Web Session that represents your IRL assets and identity, right in the browser locally, and no API authorization is required.
Generating a zero-knowledge proof based on an HTTPS Web Session that represents your IRL assets and identity, right in the browser locally, and no API authorization is required.
0xScore is a web3 reputational tool for wallets based on their on-chain activity. It allows you to analyze and compare wallets to understand their reputation and power.
